path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - Lotty Staking - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: Saving gas by directly remove liquidity to msg.sender
findings.description: Using 'to' argument with the value msg.sender in removeLiquidityETH function can save gas.

findings.title: Unnecessary usage of Ownable contract
findings.description: The ownership concept is not utilized within the contract's logic, so the inclusion of the Ownable contract is unnecessary.
